Plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.
Title: A Fish Called Wanda
Writer: John Cleese (story), Charles Crichton (story), John Cleese
Actors: John Cleese, Jamie Lee Curtis, Kevin Kline, Michael Palin
tomatoConsensus: Smartly written, smoothly directed, and solidly cast, A Fish Called Wanda offers a classic example of a brainy comedy with widespread appeal.
